Package com.tuany

Class Map

java.lang.Object
com.tuany.Map
public class Map extends Object
Contains state and behavior for player/AI gameplay maps.
Version:
1.1, 01/12/22
Author:
Tuany Van

  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map​(int xAxisLength, int yAxisLength)
      2-param constructor that creates a two-dimensional array for the "map" state.
      Parameters:
      xAxisLength - The X-dimension length of the map.
      yAxisLength - The Y-dimension length of the map.

  • Method Details

    • getSpaceAt

      public int getSpaceAt​(int x, int y)
      Takes an XY coordinate and finds map's value at the coordinate.
      Parameters:
      x - The coordinate in the X dimension.
      y - The coordinate in the Y dimension.
      Returns:
      The integer value at the given coordinates.

    • toString

      public StringBuilder toString​(boolean isShotTrackingMap)
      Iterates over the "map" instance variable to create a coordinate-system representation as a StringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      isShotTrackingMap - A boolean determining whether to create the mapString with ".XO" characters.
      Returns:
      A printable StringBuilder object representing the "map" instance variable.

    • autofillMap

      public void autofillMap()
      Autofills the "map" instance variable, written and called exclusively for the AI.

    • setMapSpace

      public void setMapSpace​(int x, int y, int value)
      Sets the "map" XY coordinate to a specified value.
      Parameters:
      x - The coordinate in the X dimension.
      y - The coordinate in the Y dimension.
      value - The value that the coordinate should be changed to.

    • getMap

      public int[][] getMap()
      Returns:
      A two-dimensional array from the "map" isntance variable.
